suggest.meta_keywords: DNSSEC, Edge DNS, Azion API, IP address security, DNS security extensions, domain security, API activation, DNS response integrity, hosted zone configuration, domain authenticity
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to activate DNSSEC on Edge DNS with Azion API to ensure the authenticity and integrity of your domain's IP address responses.

current.meta_description: Use DNSSEC compatibility to guarantee the authenticity and integrity of an IP address response.
